name: BodyGuardzSmartLife
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart life
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this skill, you can interact with your BodyGuardz Smart Life devices (like the 5-in-1 emergency hub or 360 Security Camera) and their features. You can turn easy-access features (such as the Night Light and Flash Light) via voice commands.

To use this skill, you will need a BodyGuardz Smart Life device and account (https://web.smartlife.bodyguardz.com)
You will also need to link your Amazon account with the skill. Your Smart Life account email and Amazon account email must be identical.
